name: Crest - an indirect god sim
description: Your word is gospel in this god sim set in Sub-Saharan Africa. Influence and try to control your followers using commandments but beware, free will leaves these open to interpretation. Will you create a flourishing civilization or lead them to death and destruction?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista SP1 or newer Processor: 3 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB VRAM and shader model 4.0 compatible DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista SP1 or newer Processor: 3 GHz Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1060 or equivalent DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
